title: (10459) Guijo de Santa Bárbara - 16 Carretera de Jarandilla
title_short: (10459) Guijo de Santa Bárbara - 16 Carretera de Jarandilla
description: Asphalt parking with views of the valley. Very close to the center of town. The parking is allowed to capers and AC. Level, but without any service. Only garbage.

title: (10459) Guijo de Santa Bárbara - 7 Plaza Corredores
title_short: (10459) Guijo de Santa Bárbara - 7 Plaza Corredores
description: Parking at the entrance of the town with the possibility of hiking in both summer and winter, rustic village and own Extremadura cuisine. The P for AC is that of the 3rd photo, next to the house of culture. There the path begins.

name: Área de Autocaravanas Deleitosa
title: (10370) Área de Autocaravanas Deleitosa
description: It is a new area with column payment with gray water emptying, clean water intake and electricity. Next to the pools in summer. It is a town located very close to Trujillo, Monfragüe and Guadalupe Natural Park. Good town to rest and taste good products from Extremadura at a good price. To enter with a motorhome, follow the fork that indicates prohibited except for trucks and motorhomes (the one on the left side, the other is very narrow and it is difficult to pass).

title: (10459) Guijo de Santa Bárbara -
description: Large public car park in Charco de La Maquina. It is not a place adapted for overnight, however, there are vans that stay. The place is wonderful, next to the river, quiet, and you can take a bath in the pool, crystal clear water with a very cozy little waterfall. It is right next to the Private Area for AC, but if you do not need to empty or fill, this place is a good option. The downside is that there are almost no level gaps. But the setting is worth it. In Guijo you can also do the Charco del Trabuquete route. Wonderful waterfall and place.

name: Finca La Peregrina
title: (10459) Finca La Peregrina
description: Private parking in LA PEREGRINA farm for AC and Campers. Cozy place in the middle of nature 50 meters from the Jaranda gorge.

title: (10480) Madrigal de la Vera - EX-203
description:
Picnic area on the side of the road.
It has several tables and plenty of shade.

title: (10480) - 2 Camino Cementerio
description: service area for motorhomes. Good location and brand new. 4 places, loading and unloading services, as well as electricity, all paid.

title: (10412) Garganta la Olla - 20 Avenida de la Libertad
title_short: (10412) Garganta la Olla - 20 Avenida de la Libertad
description: Parkin at the entrance of the town. Very level and close to the center of town. You can spend the night. No service. Great for a visit to the lovely town No hassle for 7:50 AC

title: (10412) Garganta la Olla - EX-391
description: Beautiful views across to Garganta la Olla on the flat parking just above the Mirador de la Serrana

title: (10412) Garganta la Olla - 33 Calle Chorrillo
description: Occasional parking in a square 100 meters from the Town Hall.

title: (10412) Garganta la Olla - 11 Calle Vélez de Guevara
title_short: (10412) Garganta la Olla - 11 Calle Vélez de Guevara
description: Former football field, free access. Along a very small road. No shade, no service but clean, quiet. Beautiful panorama. We spent a night alone in the world.

title: (10340) Castañar de Ibor - Avenida Navalmoral
description: Quiet place on the outskirts of town, concrete terrain with quite a slope.

title: (10410) Arroyomolinos de la Vera - 43 Avenida Plasencia
title_short: (10410) Arroyomolinos de la Vera - 43 Avenida Plasencia
description: Free parking with about 10 spaces, with a gray and black water emptying service.

title: (10480) Madrigal de la Vera - 25D Calle Almazara
title_short: (10480) Madrigal de la Vera - 25D Calle Almazara
description: Quiet street, we spend the night very very quiet 100 meters from shops, bars, pharmacy ... 100% recommended and with park at the door

title: (10412) Garganta la Olla - Unnamed Road
description: Mirador Carlos V viewpoint, above Garganta la Olla. The village is charming with an old town worth seeing.

title: (10412) Garganta la Olla - EX-391
description: It is a small parking lot next to the natural pools. A quiet place ideal for overnight

title: (10480) Madrigal de la Vera - Calle Doctor Bravo
title_short: (10480) Madrigal de la Vera - Calle Doctor Bravo
description: Parking next to a  Park for children. Safety, shadow from 2pm until sun set. There is a fount to take water. For free the hole day. Space  for 2 motorhomes. Nice landscape view

title: (45560) Oropesa - Unnamed Road
description: Public park with picnic tables, public restrooms, playground. Parking area, outside the town. There is a hermitage that can be visited.

title: (45560) Oropesa - Camino de Torralba
description: Quiet place on the outskirts of town. 4 sites marked for AC or motorhome and several others not marked. Inclination in the squares of the necessary shims. Drinking water, but you need a hose with a quick grip. Little shade. The town has little to visit apart from the castle, it is worth stopping off on the way and for the night.

title: (45560) Oropesa - 35B Calle Ferial
description: We looked for this space since the AC area of the town was full. It is a parking lot with room for 2 vehicles, on both sides of a small park in front of the soccer field. Quiet place, without services

title: (10480) Madrigal de la Vera - 19 Calle Garganta de Alardos
title_short: (10480) Madrigal de la Vera - 19 Calle Garganta de Alardos
description: Dirt parking next to the river, we have had a very good day with two other vans. It's right where the Roman bridge.

name: CAMPING - BUNGALOWS COMPLEJO TURISTICO LA MATA
title: (10480) CAMPING - BUNGALOWS COMPLEJO TURISTICO LA MATA
title_short: (10480) CAMPING - BUNGALOWS COMPLEJO TURISTICO LA MATA
description: Camping in Madrigal de la Vera next to the Alardos gorge

title: (10480) Madrigal de la Vera - 31 Calle Garganta de Alardos
title_short: (10480) Madrigal de la Vera - 31 Calle Garganta de Alardos
description: Parking at Madrigal de la Vera black pond. Beside the mill, a bar where you can take a snack. The town centre is about a 20 minute walk. There are routes for walking and cycling. The Roman bridge leaves the route to the Celtic castro and the satin. The bathroom in the pool is great.

title: (10480) Madrigal de la Vera - Calle Doctor Bravo
title_short: (10480) Madrigal de la Vera - Calle Doctor Bravo
description: Quiet parking area, next to a couple of pools of water to cool off you can park a couple of motorhomes and another 3 or 4 vans. No shade, only for the vans and no services.

title: (05480) Candeleda -
description: Earth parking near the ornithological observatory of Las Tejoneras. It is accessed by a dirt road. It is not well indicated. The third image is the shore of the lake which, as indicated on the sign, measures 600 m. You must return to the road where you reached the place.

title: (45570) El Puente del Arzobispo - 4 Lugar Diseminado
title_short: (45570) El Puente del Arzobispo - 4 Lugar Diseminado
description: nice spot at the riverside with pretty views to river rapids and the opposite bank with plenty erratic boulders. Close to the city center (5min walk), where you find a nice church, bakery and several supermarkets.

title: (45569) Torralba de Oropesa -
description: Quiet place at the exit of Oropesa. With trees and table to eat. Very quiet and pleasant to spend the night and rest during the day.

title: (10340) Castañar de Ibor - EX-386
description: Place in the middle of nature next to a river where you can cool off. We spent a night here with no problem. The setting is fantastic. The road is right next door, although there is almost no traffic. There is no shade.

title: (10340) Castañar de Ibor - EX-118
description: Picnic air at bord de route avec fontaine et des tables pour manger. Ombragé.

title: (45570) El Puente del Arzobispo - 83 CM-4100
description: Very interesting town for its ceramics

title: (45570) El Puente del Arzobispo - 20 Calle Don Pedro Tenorio
title_short: (45570) El Puente del Arzobispo - 20 Calle Don Pedro Tenorio
description: At the edge of the Tagus, a small car park where you can turn around, with two picnic tables, overlooking a bridge with swallow nests, next to the bridge there is a playground, if we continue on the way there is a sports area, then another playground and a small pool of water. No water point. No service.

title: (05480) Candeleda -
description: Esplanade on the edge of the Rosarito reservoir. Quiet place with views to spend the night. When it has rained, some areas of the esplanade can make the motorhome skid and make it difficult to get out. Some from Lisbon had to call the crane to get out. They parked in front of the hotel next to a small pond and got stuck. To avoid the risk as soon as you reach the corner of the hotel, take the path to the right to go to the esplanade next to the reservoir and some pine trees. 400m away is the area where the gps leaves you

title: (05480) Candeleda - 225 Calle Camino del Lomo
description: We spent the weekend and very quiet. Nearby hotel that plays some music at night. Few passersby. You can bathe, clean but not clear water. Impressive views and surroundings. We will be back. Paths / walks through nature to discover in rural areas. Goats and sheep grazing nearby. Take care of the environment! You cannot / must make a fire

title: (05480) Candeleda - 225 Calle Camino del Lomo
description: Nice corner to rest in peace, no noise. well shaded, no mosquitoes. flat

title: (10615) Barrado - CC-139
description: Very beautiful, flat lay-by on small road high in the hills. Quiet place to watch the sun set and spend the night. Check the weather - it is high in the hills. No facilities.

title: () Garganta la Olla - CC-17.4
description: Site to see the sunrise and sunset, with panoramic views of the mountains, stop or sleep if you are in the area, with good access

title: (05480) Candeleda - Carretera a El Raso
description: Nice area with some shade with views across plains. Water fountain across road.

title: (10615) Piornal - CC-17.4
description: Beautiful area in the middle of nature. It has a swimming pool, barbecue area, services You have to call to reserve. it is possible to leave the donation in a box. Yet it is open and accessible. It is a rehabilitation project of the Piornal City Council.

title: (05489) Candeleda - Carretera a El Raso
description: Nice parking area next to a river with natural small pools. Beautiful mountains above and fresh air coming from them.

title: (10615) Piornal - 2A Paseo Feria
description: Good place to spend the night behind the municipal field.

title: (05489) Candeleda - Unnamed Road
description: Parking for a hike departure. We stayed one night

title: (10615) Piornal - Unnamed Road
description: Location for cars and vans, unlimited height with good panoramic views, to admire the sunset, possibility to go cycling ... Etc. .. There is no shade, no services, it is accessible by a rural road. Road in good condition

title: (10696) Barrado - EX-213
description: Small place to sleep with picnic tables next to the village hermitage.

name: Camping de Candeleda
title: (05480) Camping de Candeleda
description: Campsite with swimming pool.

title: (10341) Navalvillar de Ibor - Unnamed Road
description: Spectacular site next to the Ibor river. very quiet area surrounded by nature. only small motorhome.

title: (10341) Navalvillar de Ibor - EX-118
description: Rest area, just after the bridge before reaching Navalvillar de Ibor from Castañar de Ibor. Place with nice views, fenced, with garbage cans and picnic tables. Fairly level.

title: (05480) Candeleda -
description: Dirt lot next to the soccer field. Quiet to sleep.

title: (10591) Toril - Unnamed Road
description: Nice views of the river. Parking is precarious on a small sloping shoulder next to the road

title: (10615) Piornal - 40 Paseo de las Escuelas
description: Piornal viewpoint. views of the Jerte Valley. We stopped to see the lookout.

title: (10341) Navalvillar de Ibor - 42 Calle San Roque
title_short: (10341) Navalvillar de Ibor - 42 Calle San Roque
description: Parking on the outskirts of the town. Perfect for resting and for children to relax in the park. Source and containers for recycling garbage.

title: (10252) Torrecillas de la Tiesa - N-V
description: Beneath a 14th century bridge directly next to a river. No noise from the nearby highway and very little traffic at night on the N-V. No services.

title: (45569) Oropesa -
description: Quiet place, we park the motorhome without any difficulty. Lots of fishing people.

title: (10615) Piornal - Unnamed Road
description: Free, next to a beautiful waterfall. With spring.

title: (45569) Oropesa - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet place in nature at the edge of Navalcan lake. Access via a dirt road. Shadow in the morning under the trees. Many birds and no one on the horizon?

title: (10341) Navalvillar de Ibor - EX-118
description: Rest area next to a road with little traffic (at least in January) views of the shady villuercas and a fountain.

title: (10373) Roturas - De Navazuelas - Retamosa
description: Picnic area with tables with benches under a shade roof, 7 fixed umbrellas, rubbish bins and an area for bathing. About 6 seats for cars (or 2 for a motorhome).

title: (05489) El Raso - Carr. Chilla
description: Place before the entrance of the national park, before the santuario. good view of the sunset and also sunrise with a short climb. the upper area is more flat, but seems to be used to turn by the school bus, so try to leave space for that, the lower area is very big, but uneven and gets used by the locals for picnics.

title: (05480) Candeleda - 45 Carretera Oropesa
description: Ample source of drinking water

title: (10616) Cabrero - Unnamed Road
description: Flat car park. you park above the pool, impossible to enter with motorhomes, during bathroom hours from 4 to 9 do not enter with large vans, you will not be able to turn around. outside those hours empty parking lots with about 6 spaces, sleeping super cool

title: (05480) Candeleda - 6 Avenida Ramón y Cajal
description: Laundry room with vending machine and coffee machine. Tidy and very clean.

title: (10616) Casas del Castañar - CC-105
description: Running drinking water (unthreaded for a hose) not far from the road.

title: (10251) Aldeacentenera - Unnamed Road
description: Peaceful at the edge of the elongated Rio. perfect for a night and ornithological.

title: (10616) Cabrero - Travesía Cuarta Paseo del Canchal
title_short: (10616) Cabrero - Travesía Cuarta Paseo del Canchal
description: Great site for day and night beautiful view

title: (05480) Candeleda - 14 Paseo la Garganta de Santa María
title_short: (05480) Candeleda - 14 Paseo la Garganta de Santa María
description: Fantastic, no noise, under some big trees and next to the river. We were in March, but in the summer it is sure to be more difficult to park there.

address.street: 14 Paseo la Garganta de Santa María

title: (10616) Casas del Castañar - 8 Calle Pasaderos
description: Perfect esplanade to park or spend the night inside the town and away from the road. Very level with a children's park and public services. You can take water from the fountain in the park (you need a 6-7 meter hose) and the toilet in a grate next to the fountain, has a fat tube and the remains do not remain above causing odor.

title: (10614) Valdastillas - 17 Calle Roble
description: Parking to visit the gorge of marta. You have to pass about 100 meters of narrow road. There are picnic areas. We haven't spent the night but there were a couple of level spots

title: (05480) Candeleda - 20 Camino la Luz
description:
Nice parking lot, with shade, next to a spectacular bathing area, drinking water source, 1 km walk from the town, in summer you have to pay for the blue zone, 12 euros/day for motorhomes, but it's worth it.
At night you can spend the night without problems, and it is quite cool, even in summer.

title: (10614) Valdastillas - 36 Paseo Naranjos
description: On the street there are some large squares where you can park but there is a lot of unevenness. Nearby is the route to the Marta waterfall that is worth visiting and its sea of jerte cherry trees. You cannot leave town without eating at La Garza Real Restaurant. Good is the only one in town.

name: La Finca Solidaria
title: (10251) La Finca Solidaria
description:
Nice welcome by a dynamic young couple in full development of their educational farm and rural tourism project "La finca solidaria"
They speak French and Spanish, a little English and German.
Facilities: sink, gas stove in a shelter furnished with tables and chairs, shower and dry toilet.
Dogs and cats roam free on a large plot of land. There are also donkeys, goats, sheep and chickens.
Pitches available for motorhome, caravan, van, tent, etc.
Gate width: 3.00 m
Warning: Do not take the path facing the cemetery which is very narrow surrounded by stone walls. Take the dirt road located just above, where there is a green agricultural building.
Do not hesitate to call if in doubt.

name: Camping Bungalow Valle del Jerte
title: (10612) Camping Bungalow Valle del Jerte
description: Campsite next to the Jerte river. Very close to the Hell's Throat. Many routes to visit the Jerte valley. Expensive for what it offers. Lots of shade, as it has very tall trees. This is a problem for large motorhomes. Be careful not to rub the branches during maneuvers. Good pool with grass. It is in a privileged environment a few meters from the Garganta de los Infierno. The discharge area has only one faucet which should be used to charge the water and clean the toilet

title: (10613) Navaconcejo - 45 Calle Juan Azabal
description: Level and large parking, ideal when the area is saturated, you can sleep without problems

title: (10613) Navaconcejo - 3C Paraje Molino la Rana
description: Ample parking, with a playground and nearby bars (snacks, hamburgers,...). Good option if the area is crowded.

title: (10613) Navaconcejo - 120-134 Avenida de Extremadura
description: On the banks of the Jerte River. Next to the LUN bar, where you eat well and cheaply. Very close to the Gorge de le Nogaleras.

title: (10613) Navaconcejo - 54 Carretera Nacional 110 Diseminado
description: Near the river, very quiet night

title: (10612) Cabezuela del Valle - 12 N-110
description: Gande esplanade in gravel visible from the road (it is necessary to take the bridge). Nothing exceptional but it allows to be much more quiet and less roadside than the camping area because located at the entrance of "Garganta de los infiernos". There is room to mail the dogs. Peaceful night before the ballad in the gorges.

title: (10613) Navaconcejo - 6 Calle Cerro Real
description: Large quiet parking next to the river Jerte.

name: Camping Bungalows Rio Jerte
title: (10613) Camping Bungalows Rio Jerte
description: Navaconcejo, 46 ​​N-110. Camping with many facilities, paddle tennis, tennis, gym, swimming pool and natural pool, wifi throughout the campsite. Bar and restaurant. summer activity monitors. Etc ..

title: (10613) Navaconcejo - 5A Carretera Nacional 110 Diseminado
description: Parking next to the municipal sports center, quite wide where they fit where they could park 10 or 15 AC or vans. There is a motorhome area but since it is full, we come here, I think there is no problem staying overnight. Quite a few garbage cans right here.

title: (10613) Navaconcejo - 34c Paseo Río Jerte
description: Parking anxiety right next to the river certainly very quiet, ideal to see the city and if it was necessary to spend the night.

title: (10613) Navaconcejo - 32 Carretera Nacional 110 Diseminado
description: Beautiful place next to the natural pool and you can reach in a few minutes walk Navaconcejo.

title: (10613) Navaconcejo - 28 Calle Cerro Real
description: Very quiet day and night parking next to the Jerte river and next to plaza de los toros, some trees if it is not busy good place to park

title: (10612) Cabezuela del Valle - 12 N-110
description: Paid parking.

title: (10610) Cabezuela del Valle - 3 Urbanizacion Caja Ahorros
title_short: (10610) Cabezuela del Valle - 3 Urbanizacion Caja Ahorros
description: Parking next to a beach bar and a river pool. 5 minutes from the bar area, the town center and the cherry museum ( which is worth it).

title: (10612) Cabezuela del Valle - 12 Carretera Ávila
description: Paid parking. Perfect to start excursions to the pylons or the bridges. Recently built, so it does not correspond to what is seen in the satellite view.

title: (10610) Cabezuela del Valle -
description: Place in the town where 3 vans fit. Next to the river.

title: (10613) Navaconcejo - 39 Avenida del Pilar
description: Small car park at the confluence of two rivers. Very pretty situation and quiet apart from the river. Room for one motor home. No services.

title: (10610) Cabezuela del Valle - 12D Diseminado Carretera
description: Free field next to Jerte. From there you can go out to do the many routes and trails with incredible views. Remember to bring a swimsuit in case you are brave and take a bath in one of the natural swamps. There are numerous bars nearby (when I went there was only 1 open) and a supermarket. The quiet night. There is little traffic of cars that go to farms in the mountains. It is also a place where people go for a walk. There are two garbage cans at the junction to the road, so you have no excuses to leave it dirty ☺️

title: (10612) Jerte - 4 Calle la Nogalea
description: Perfect but beware, only pickups discreetly, hiking and btt trekking for children, chiringuito and fountain
